Levels.succesful_stop: Presentation of a face image in a trial with a stop signal in which participant inhibited response.
Levels.unsuccesful_stop: Presentation of a face image in a trial with a stop signal in which participant did not inhibit response.
Levels.go: Presentation of a face image in a trial with no stop signal

response_accuracy.Description: Indicates whether a response correctly indicated

Levels.incorrect: Used the wrong hand to indicate the sex of the face image.
Levels.correct: Used the correct hand to indicate the sex of the face image.

Levels.left: A response using the left hand.
Levels.right: A response using the right hand.

Levels.male: The image was the face of a male person.
Levels.female: The image was the face of a female person.

hed_defs.Description: HED user-defined terms for the dataset.
